price: Samuudfoͻ no hͻ nso; εberε a yεka kyerεε wͻn sε: “Modeε monye moani nkosi εberε bi “.
arabic: وَفِي ثَمُودَ إِذۡ قِيلَ لَهُمۡ تَمَتَّعُواْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wafī thamūda idh qīla lahum tamattaʿū ḥattā ḥīnin
